82936.summary: Some customers in the Whyte Ridge area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82936.title: Sept 9 - Winnipeg (Whyte Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
